scripts.install-extension: jupyter nbextension install --py --symlink --sys-prefix {{ project_name }}_jup && jupyter nbextension enable {{ project_name }}_jup --py --sys-prefix
scripts.pypi-publish: rm dist/*.tar.gz || true && python setup.py sdist && twine upload dist/*.tar.gz
scripts.npm-publish: yarn copy-bundle && echo "Now you should login to npm and then run: npm publish"
